name: AQUA Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance for Men and Women. A clean, fresh and green blend of Grass, Cucumber, Waterlily, and  Aqua notes, in a subtle base of light Musk and Wood. $14.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: NIGHT JASMINE Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance.  A warm, sweet, dark and sexy blend of Egyptian Musk, White Musk and Vanilla with exotic Indian Jasmine and Spices. This fragrance evokes the fragrance of Jasmine flowers on a dark, warm night. $12.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: FLEUR BLANC Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance.  A truly feminine and deliciate blend of sweet White Musk, Vanilla and Sandalwood, subtle and fresh Evergreen, Citrus and Aqua notes, finished off with the soft floral notes of Gardenia and Tuberose.  A soft, sexy and utterly feminine fragrance. $14.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: FLEUR NOIR Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance. A dark, warm, sexy, sweet and intoxicating blend of warm Amber, Vanilla and Musk, subtle Spices and Berries, and floral notes of Jasmine, Violet, and Plum Blossom. $14.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: LEATHER Life Original Fragrance for Men
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance for Men. A dark and sexy blend of worn leather, musk and warm woods, with subtle notes of dark berries and spice. A timeless fragrance for the true man. $14.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: GRASSLAND Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance. A fresh, green and woodsy blend of Cedarwood, Sweetgrass, Spruce, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Green Tea and White Tea, great for both men and women. This blend has a soft and subtly sweet base note of wood, mid notes of sweetgrass and teas, and finishes off with bright citrus top notes. $14.00 for 1/4 oz.

name: LOVE Life Original Fragrance
description: A best selling Life Original Fragrance. A warm, sexy and intoxicating blend of Ambers, Wood, Musk, Vanilla, Spices and subtle Rose. The characteristics of this fragrance are sweet, woodsy, earthy, and feminine. $14.00 for a 1/4 oz.

name: 1/4 oz Oil
description:
Our fragrant and exotic oils can be used for your personal fragrance or for scenting your home. Life oils are long lasting, concentrated, and we do not add any alcohol to them. Life fragrances are best worn on any pulse point like the wrist, behind the ears, or knees. 

A * next to the name means it is a Natural Essential Oil.

A few of the oils have different prices so double check the price before ordering.

name: Shea Butter Revitalizing Lotion
description:
One of Life's best selling lotions, this all-over body emollient contains 5% African Shea Butter, an effective level proven to soothe, hydrate and guard skin from harsh environmental factors, while providing lasting moisture. Revitalizing sugar cane, aloe, plus anti-oxidants grape seed and vitamin E restore softness and youth. Paraben free. Choose your scent from our selection of best selling fragrances.
The * mark next to a fragrance means its an essential oil, also please note that some fragrances are higher in price due to wholesale price differences.

Our Shea Butter Lotion is available in an 8 ounce bottle and a 16 ounce bottle.

name: The "Bali" Bag
description: A Life original, custom-designed genuine leather bag.  Brass studs forming a flower design on front, with decorative brass hardware, magnetic closure and satin lining.  With 4 inside pockets for organizing, this bag has great storage space!
